titleStmt.title: A tragedy called the Popish Plot reviv'd detecting the secret league between the late King James and the French king, the popish conspiracy to murder His present Majesty King William, and the wicked contrivance for adulterating the coin of this kingdom : with many other hellish practices : dedicated to Sir Roger L'Strange, the Fellows of St. John's College in Cambridg, non jurors, and the rest of the Jacobite crew / by a sincere lover of his countrey.
titleStmt.author: Oates, Titus, 1649-1705.

notesStmt.note: Written by Titus Oates. Cf. Wing.
Consists primarily of extracts from Oates' letters, testimony, and various works.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
